The ADA also provides information about health insurance options at www.diabetes.org/living-with-diabetes/health-insurance .
                
Keeping Group Health Insurance after Leaving a Job
                
When leaving a job, a person may be able to continue the group health insurance provided by his or her employer for up to 18 months under a federal law called the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act, or COBRA. Although people p
